metadata.description: FAU Final Smart Home IoT Project

utterances.text: Place a bar across the door.
Put a bolt on the window.
Enjoy a party in the park.
Read a novel in the library
Take a nap in the afternoon
Play a board game with friends
Go for a swim in the pool
Paint a picture of the landscape
Take a walk in the park
Write a letter to a friend
Read a book under the shade.
Plant a tree in the backyard
Bake a chocolate cake for desert
Catch the sunrise at the beach
Ok you can hear me now
Secure the windows and make sure everything is locked before you leave
Make sure the door is locked when you leave
After you leave close and lock the door
Shut the bedroom door behind you
Lock the bedroom door behind you
I don't feel any air, can you turn up the fan some?
The wind is blowing in my face, please turn off the fan.
It's hot, turn on the Fan.
Can you put the Fan on?
That's my song can you turn it up?
Can you turn up the AC
It's cold in here can you turn up the heat?
I can't hear the TV, turn it up.
I can't hear the speakers are too low, please turn up the music
Speakers are too loud please turn it down
Muisic is too loud please turn down the speakers
Heat is blasting please lower it.
AC is blasting please lower it.
It's cold can you turn down the AC
It's hot can you turn down the heat
Hit the switch to the kitchen
Please flip the switch to the lights
